message: I read on ep.io that their free instance only being loaded if there's a request coming in. I'm curious how they do this. I have a limited memory vps and plan to squeeze as much as python/django apps as I could. The apps would be idle most of the time so it kind of wasting the memory if all of it using a dedicated process.
I don't mind the slow start up of first request since this is mainly for demo only so having the ability to host more applications is more important.
